situation.title: Employer/Employee relations
situation.meta_description:
I need the confirmation of a negative test result for the employer.
My employer insists on my physical presence at work, even though I should be quarantined.

situation.title: eRouška - problems
situation.meta_description: eRouška (mobile app) reports a risky contact, but I wasn't anywhere that day.

situation.title: General Practitioner
situation.meta_description: My General Practitioner refuses to write me an eŽádanka (online request for testing facilities).

situation.title: Delays in tracing and testing
situation.meta_description:
I was in risky contact with a positive person. I know this from them, but the hygiene station hasn't called me yet and it's been more than 2 days.
I was on the test more than 24 hours ago, but I have not yet received the result.

situation.title: Second-hand contact
situation.meta_description: I am a contact of a person who had risky contact with an infected person.
